channel.title: What updates are you looking forward to?
channel.description: Personally, I've been waiting for red dragons in their own damn caves which you can fight them in the overworld for a long time now, notch/jeb still haven't delivered :S

item.title: What updates are you looking forward to?
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

the aether would be pretty cool, and also air tanks or air suits you can put on to stay underwater for long periods of time. possibly a fish mob.

Read full topic
item.source: What updates are you looking forward to?

item.title: What updates are you looking forward to?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

xxx123xxx:

They make use of the ocean better[/quote][quote=“Travas, post:2, topic:520371”]Official mod support

Those. And also I’d like some of the more popular mods to be put into the game officially. Like optifine, or parts of forestry/redpower. And some of the more in-depth mods (industrialcraft, buildcraft, thaumcraft) should be in the game but you have an option to enable/disable them for each world, including multiplayer.

Read full topic
item.source: What updates are you looking forward to?

item.title: What updates are you looking forward to?

item.description:

Such as underwater plants?

needs moar coral

I remember downloading a mod which had coral in the ocean, was pretty cool

item.title: What updates are you looking forward to?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Travas:

Official mod support, for sure. I don’t really know what is expected in the future, though, but I like any updates. I hope there are new biomes, etc

New biomes is something I want too, especially really large mountains to accommodate the new 256 block height
